name.description: The full name of the candidate.

description.description: A short description of the candidate.

imageUrl.description: A URL pointing to a photo of the candidate.

vote.title: Vote
vote.description: A single vote cast by a citizen for a specific group.

nationalId.description: The national ID of the voter.

candidateId.description: The ID of the candidate who received the vote.

candidateName.description: The name of the candidate who received the vote.

groupId.description: A static ID for the election.

votedAt.description: The timestamp when the vote was cast.

electionSetting.title: Election Setting
electionSetting.description: Settings to control the state of an election.

status.description: The current status of the election.

startDate.description: The start date and time for the election.

endDate.description: The end date and time for the election.

group.title: Election Group
group.description: A category for an election, e.g., 'Presidential' or 'Parliamentary'.

name.description: The name of the election group.

description.description: A short description of the group.

/votes/{voteId}.description: Collection where each document represents a single vote. Document ID is a composite of nationalId and a static groupId.

/settings/{settingId}.description: Collection for application-wide settings. E.g., 'election' doc for status.

/groups/{groupId}.description: Collection of election groups or types.
